title: The Draymond Green Show - Dray's Return To Practice, Harden/Embiid + a Charles Barkley Interview
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - Dray's Return To Practice, Harden/Embiid + a Charles Barkley Interview
description:
Draymond Green gives an update on his return from injury before giving his take on the new-look 76ers pairing James Harden and Joel Embiid, and why even though the Lakers are slumping you can never count out Lebron James. Then he's joined by Charles Barkley to discuss Kobe Bryant almost joining ‘Inside the NBA’, why the price of college education is a problem in America, why Draymond reminds Charles of Dennis Rodman, whether him and Shaq ever actually get on each other’s nerves, LeBron’s greatness, and much more. 

Produced by Jackson Safon.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
